Question: His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
Hints: This was rejected by this person, who stated he had promised his ally Austria this would not happen.
However, this person was able to rush reinforcements to Antwerp, owing to Britain's inadequately organised Walcheren Campaign.
The Austrians failed to capitalise on the situation and allowed this person's forces to regroup.
